name: Flap
description:
The Ultimate Flappy Game!

Watch out for the incoming poles and spiked as you flap your way through this colorful futuristic path. And if you are a color enthusiast, then we have a color editor for you where you can make your own color themes!

Collect and unlock! Many birds are waiting for your taps.

Full Feature List:
• SIMPLE controls. Tap to Flap!
• Customize your colors
• 20 birds
• Daily gifts
• Power-ups
